issues.description: The problem statement (UML and text) requires a constructor that initializes all five attributes (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors) in that order, but the template's Lecture constructor only declares three parameters (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents). The solution implements a five-parameter constructor. This mismatch in constructor parameters between the problem specification and the template will confuse students and block them from implementing the constructor as specified without changing the provided signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the template Lecture constructor signature to match the problem statement UML and the solution: public Lecture(String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors) and initialize all five attributes in the same order. Keep the constructor body as a TODO for students to fill or provide a correct initialization consistent with the UML.
